subject: Web3
title: Bitcoin ETF Approval
description: A short lesson to help you apply Bitcoin ETF Approval.

hook.text: In January 2024, the SEC approved spot Bitcoin ETFs after a decade of rejections. Wall Street finally got its crypto product.

buildup.text: BlackRock, Fidelity, and other giants launched Bitcoin ETFs. Billions of dollars flowed in within the first week.

discovery.text: ETFs let traditional investors buy Bitcoin through retirement accounts and brokerages without touching crypto exchanges.

twist.text: The SEC approved the ETFs reluctantly, after losing a court case to Grayscale. The regulator was forced, not convinced.

climax.text: Bitcoin ETFs were the most successful ETF launches in history. Legitimacy through a product the SEC tried to block for a decade.

punchline.text: Ten years of rejections. One court loss. The most successful ETF launch ever.

quiz.question: Why did the SEC finally approve spot Bitcoin ETFs?
options: It lost a court case to Grayscale and was legally compelled to approve
